DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to learn more about the genetics of chronic sinusitis and identify genes involved in chronic sinusitis.
DOC.criteria: Age> 18 years Diagnosis of chronic sinusitis or normal sinuses (with verification by imaging.) You must have a recent CT scan showing either normal sinuses or the presence of sinus disease. Genetic or acquired immunodeficiency Ciliary dyskinesia Cystic fibrosis Autoimmune disease Cancer of the sinuses
